items.title: Can we use --quantization None to disable quantization?
items.summary: 症状/環境が近い投稿。エラー文と権限・prefix・PATHが焦点になりやすい。
items.reply_draft:
I feel you — this kind of error is usually about permissions / install location / PATH / caches.
I summarized a step-by-step checklist (with common mistakes + fixes) here: https://mikann20041029.github.io/solve-multi-python-modulenotfounderror-202602211614/
If you can share OS + Node/npm versions and the exact command, it's easier to pinpoint.
